item.description:
Passionate about the potential of data and its applications, I hold a Post Degree Diploma in Data Analytics. Proficient in utilizing tools like Python, R, Tableau, Power BI, and PostgreSQL, I have gained practical experience in exciting collaborative projects involving predicting trends, sorting data, and understanding human language using Natural Language Processing.

Throughout my journey, I collaborated with real companies to solve genuine problems. By partnering with them, we improved their understanding of customers and efficiently managed large volumes of data.

Having worked with various organizations over time, I have acquired skills in multiple programming languages and data tools. For instance, my experience at Softgic equipped me with expertise in data transformation, web development, and databases.

Recognized for my creative thinking, I am dedicated to continuous learning and strongly believe in the power of teamwork, leadership, and effective communication.

Benefiting from an engineering background, my logical and problem-solving abilities have been enhanced.
